articles.title: An ode to Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney, football's best owners - Planet Football
articles.description: Hollywood actors Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney have ignored the sceptics and Wrexham have become the envy of clubs across the country. It's hard to find owners as popular as these two.
